# count

**Instance Property**

The number of media items in a collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var count: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

In some cases, using this property is more efficient than fetching the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaItemCollection/items] array and asking for the count.

## Using a media item collection

- **items**: The media items in a media item collection.
- **representativeItem**: A media item whose properties are representative of the other media items in a collection.
- **mediaTypes**: The types of the media items in a collection.
